R 101

Posted on November 13, 2015

Sometimes when you open a data file (lets say a .csv), variables will be recognized as factor whereas it should be numeric. It is therefore tempting to simply convert the variable to numeric using as.numeric(). Big mistake! If you use directly as.numeric() on a variable of the type factor, R... [Read More]

Introducing eemR

Posted on November 5, 2015

The eemR package implements various functions used calculate metrics from excitation-emission matrix (EEM) as well as to preform pre-processing corrections before PARAFAC analysis. All functions from this package start with the eem_ prefix. Please note this is a very alpha version of the package for testing purpose only. [Read More]
